description:
A popular, inspiring, and intuitive font editor built to help you create amazing new fonts and edit existing fonts.


- Fixed issue with setting maximum and minimum values for the range of axis values
- Improved generation of OpenType layout features
- Improved localization
- Changed trial period â€” now 7 days instead of 30
- macOS only: Added View Guidelines and Lock Guidelines settings
- macOS only: Improved Add Anchor dialog
- Minor other improvements
